Description:
Mud Brick Cottage on 3/4 acre adjoining Regional Park
A part of Bendigo's past has come onto the market, with this unique home, adjoining Bendigo Regional Park and forest area.
Historically, the cottage was built around the 1870s and it was one of the small farmlets that operated in the area at that time. It now offers options for someone to live comfortably and is perfectly positioned for peace and tranquillity.
The property has two bedrooms, lounge with open fireplace, and spacious open-plan kitchen/dining room with gas plates, electric wall oven and solid fuel heater.
Laundry and bathroom with claw foot bath and vanity.
Outside is a paved brick pergola area, cottage gardens, and shed with 2 car parking spaces and a workshop area. There is a standalone studio which is a great space for your hobbies, 1.5kw solar system, plus tank water for the Cottage and a 1 meg water entitlement that feeds directly into the dam.
This is a fantastic location on the edge of the forest and at the end of the lane, with wildlife and bird life around, and just three minutes to Kangaroo Flat.
This unique Cottage has lots of history, and is well worth inspecting.

Description:
Elevated Views & Something Special Awaits
If Kitchens and Bathrooms are value and focal points of any home buyers purchase, then this fantastic home delivers
Comprising of a Designer, light filled Kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, character timber doors, Brand New Gas Wall Oven never used ,also Dishwasher and stunning black tiles amidst black bench tops.
like new bathroom and new carpets.
Ready for your immediate living this is a spatial 3-bedroom home with a a particularly cool floor plan and design layout built by J & A KING Homes One of our most Renowned Builders with their trademark High Ceilings and Designer meets Modern appeal fit out and design that still stays true to their fantastic quality and brand today
Main Bedroom has En-Suite and walk in wardrobe.
The main bathroom has just been fully renovated and gleams like brand new with a New shower, New tiles, New Bath and New Vanity Basin, just awesome ..
The home has been just been fully Painted, with all New Carpets There is Gas Central heating and Evaporative Air Con, all rooms have New Blinds.
All around the home is a generous amount of concrete and paving, also an excellent BBQ built in with mains gas.
At the front of the home is a large Car Port.
From the Kitchen you a wonderful view looking at brick retaining wall the length of the home with a delightful stepped feature garden and adjacent to that is the state forest giving you lots of natural fresh air and added non built out privacy
At the rear is a good-sized Garden shed.
A big surprise bonus is the fully detached outbuilding thats fully lined just painted is it a
Studio / Workshop Sleep Out / outhouse 4th bedroom OR a Man cave? We will let you decide:) all we know is it looks very spacious and it has new Carpet & includes its own Air Con!
This home is truly delightful & best of all it is ready for you to move into now.
Be quick to see this Fantastic Property that has even more potential than meets the eye. Call Rod Jones now
* all sizes are approximate only. Buyers due diligence checklist https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Maintenance-free lifestyle.
Inspection by appointment only. Please call Ben on 0477 277 564.
Downsize in the safe and secure surrounds of this lovely two bedroom villa. Located in the Aviva Communities Retirement Village, Kangaroo Flat, it offers affordable, independent living for over 55s.
The one-owner villa features two bedrooms with robes, spacious open lounge, dining and u-shaped kitchen equipped with gas cooktop/electric oven, good storage with pantry, ample cupboards and pot drawers with island bench/breakfast bar separating it from the roomy dining area.
The carpeted gas-heated lounge has direct access to the carport and front porch while fuss-free split system heating/cooling complemented by a ceiling fan keeps it cosy or cool year round.
Both bedrooms include built-in-robes and sit beside the central bathroom, separate wc and laundry.
Outside, the divided tandem carport can be used as a delightful, sheltered outdoor living area if desired while the compact backyard includes two garden sheds and a rainwater tank.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of secure gated entry with CCTV monitoring and a community clubhouse incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, and their own Men's Shed.
A team of community gardeners take care of all common spaces to keep the place looking great - there's even a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
Without a big old home and garden to maintain you will be able to enjoy more time both in and out of the community.
It's a short walk to Centro Lansell shopping centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby for active types.
*Purchasers must be over 55 and will be required to enter into a separate agreement with the Aviva Communities.
** COVID 19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact the agent or our office on 03 5444 2526.
While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Description:
A GREAT CHOICE IN KANGAROO FLAT
This is an excellent example of a home that has been really well looked after inside and out over many years. It offers two living spaces, easy-care yard and position is superb - a walk to the shops and schools, only metres from transport and miles of walking tracks along Bendigo Creek and handy to Crusoe Reservoir.
Inside this neat and tidy home there is a large L-shaped lounge and dining room boasting modern floating floor, split-system heating and cooling and a gas wall furnace; there's a separate meals space and smaller family room which has access outside. The kitchen is adjacent and boasts gas hot plates, electric oven, ample cabinetry and overhead cupboards and there are views to the rear yard.
All three bedrooms are spacious and feature built-in-robes, the bathroom boasts a corner shower and large vanity unit and there's a separate toilet. The laundry is tiled, has a cupboard and has handy access out back.
Out front is a long veranda facing north-west with sunblinds for that afternoon sun protection, at the rear is a large covered alfresco spanning the length of the house. There's a garden bed dividing the alfresco from the single carport and single car space - which boasts an auto roller-door with direct street access from Queen St.
The 534m2 allotment is private, there is a grassed space in the rear yard, a small garden shed and everything is simply neat, tidy and there is nothing to do.
This home is very attractive from the front with the lovely feature palms on display, it is easy-care and ripe for the new owner to continue on the legacy of this lovely home.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME IN CONVENIENT LOCATION! BUY NOW AND SAVE MONEY!
This exciting new home is currently under construction and will soon be completed, brand new and ready for you to move in. Located only 700m from the Big Hill Primary School and a short walk to Lansell Plaza shopping centre the home sits on a generously proportioned 700m2 allotment. Step inside the home and you will love the extra high ceilings, light filled living spaces and all new appliances throughout. The home offers four bedrooms with built in robes and master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite with tilted shower base. The main living space is open plan and the kitchen offers 900mm cookware, stone bench tops and loads for storage. There is solar hot water on the roof, ducted heating and cooling throughout the home and double garage with remote access. First home buyers are still eligible for a $20,000 grant. Completion due later 2020. Don't hesitate to call me should you have any questions.

Description:
Lifestyle Living in Kangaroo Flat.
Claim your lifestyle, location and homely comforts with this Kangaroo Flat opportunity.
Nestled in central Olympic Parade on 700m2 sits this sturdy and well-maintained property offering all the benefits of its location; close to Crusoe College, Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, walking tracks, schools and day-cares or a short drive to Kangaroo Flat's shopping precinct or Bendigo CBD.
Head into your large lounge area to the right off the entrance or straight into your neatly presented updated kitchen with more living space adjacent, there's plenty of room for the whole family.
An abundance of storage throughout with built-in storage shelves and quality cabinetry, benchtops, stainless steel appliances and open alcove allowing for easy surveillance of the kids makes the kitchen a highlight.
Down the hallway sits your three bedrooms with ceiling fans, built-in robes and plenty of natural light. A main bathroom offers practicality and space with its vanity with storage cupboards, a shower and bath.
Controlling your comfort is a breeze with the property's multiple heating and cooling options including a freestanding wood burning fireplace in the lounge, evaporative cooling and a split system heater and cooler.
The backyard is set to impress with its large undercover and paved entertaining patio, a 5m by 8.5m powered and concreted shed with workshop, concreted garden shed and wood storage shed.
A carport to the side of the home with direct vehicle access to the backyard also adds to this property's practicality.
Invest and bring in a rental income, enter the property market as a first home buyer or purchase and occupy for yourself. In its central Kangaroo Flat location and generous block size add this winner to the inspection list.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED PROPERTY - PRICED TO SELL!
* Modernised three bedroom weatherboard with BIR's on 637mÂ² block.
* Open plan kitchen and living space.
* Modern, open kitchen, living and dining.
* All year comfort with ducted heating and cooling.
* Very low maintenance, securely fenced property with impressive 10 x 6m shed.
* Re-stumped, new roof and new weatherboards.
* Walk to train station, shops and primary school.
* Public transport nearby.
This impressively modernised property is situated close to the shops, schools and public transport of Kangaroo Flat. The three bedroom property is exceptionally well presented with the current owners having outgrown their home.
With three bedrooms all with BIR's, ducted heating and cooling, open plan living and a low maintenance but well established garden and yard, this property will cater for a family, buyers looking to down size or the investor looking to purchase a property that is easy to lease.
The shed has been divided into a play area for the kids at the rear and storage/workshop at the front.
The irrigation systems makes it easy to maintain the well-established lawns and garden.
Call now to arrange an inspection and be pleasantly surprised how well this property is presented.

Address: 92 Kangaroo Gully Road Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
AN IDEAL BLOCK FOR YOUR DREAM HOME!
A beautifully positioned building block of about 3,200m2 [3/4 acre], zoned Low Density Residential, in a serene little gully, less than 2kms from the centre of Kangaroo Flat. Bordered by a creek bed and magnificent red gum trees, the setting that this property provides is a dream come true for some.
Surrounded by native birds and wild life, Kangaroo Gully Road is tucked away nicely from the hustle of the suburbs yet almost walking distance to all of the great amenities that Kangaroo Flat now has to offer.
This property is in a gorgeous setting, whether you are looking for that tranquil place to retire or a special place to build (STCA) and raise a family with room to move.

Description:
Stunning family home with quality finish!
This privately built large family home really does have it all with convenience and luxury in all areas of the home. Boasting a modern style both inside and outside the property accompanied with quality fixtures and fittings, this is one the whole family will fall in love with.
Situated on a sizable 679 SQM allotment located just minutes from all of Kangaroo Flat's best amenties and CBD, Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, Kangaroo Flat train station, Lansell Plaza and not to mention many of the local schools and pre-schools just a stone's throw away.
The home itself boasts generosity in size with 4 spacious bedrooms, a large study/office space, a massive ensuite to the master room complimented by a tastefully designed double vanity. There's no shortage of space for the family in this property with multiple living and entertaining spaces throughout.
As you enter the property the entrance of the home will truly blow you away with its high ceilings, natural light and timber 'floating steps' leading to the second level. Within the open kitchen living space there is more than enough room to cook, dine and relax to your hearts desire. Completed by marble top island bench and stainless steel modern appliances to top it all off.
The second level of the home has been spared no shortage of space nor attention to detail with an amazing open plan living space followed on by the perfect outdoor entertaining deck area overlooking the vista of Kangarooo Flat, views as far as the eye can see!
The backyard of the home offers plenty of garden and yard space for every member of the family. Fully landscaped at both the front and back of the property it offers an array of convenience with large side access to the rear of the block for trailers, caravans etc and is topped off with an ample shed perfect for a workshop or storage!
You can rest easy throughout all seasons of the year with the comfort of ducted heating and cooling and additional 5 kilowatt solar panels to ensure those bills stay as low as possible!
No stone has been left unturned with this ideal, contemporary property. The only thing left to be done is open the door to your next chapter, in your dream home. Don't miss your opportunity to secure this amazing property!
Inquire today to book your in person or digital inspection with the agent.
(ENOE)

Description:
Elevated, Private & Ready to be built on
This 832 square metre allotment is not only in a great location but comes with a few extras, including:
- The allotment is in located in a quiet cul-de-sac only a few minutes from Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, a 5 minute drive from Lansell Square Shopping Centre, walking distance to Kangaroo Flat CBD, close to schools, childcare facilities, medical clinics, walking tracks and parks.
- The allotment is currently fully fenced. The option is therefore yours, to either keep the fence or remove it.
- A soil test has already been done and has been deemed a Class M (report is available upon request).
- The building site has already been laser levelled too! So, it's just a matter of finding a house plan you like that fits and you can commence the building process.
- No easements exist on the allotment currently and all services are at the front.
Get in quick as this block is priced to sell and won't last long. Call us now for more information.

Description:
Family Friendly Home On Big Block!
If you are looking for a spacious family home on approx 1501mÂ² of land near Lansell Square Shopping Centre, this 2014 Glenloddon Homes built residence could be the one.
The ideal combination of a big house and big land means there is space for everyone and their needs.
The home offers four bedrooms, two bathrooms, three living areas and extensive outdoor living areas.
The tiled front porch opens to a central hallway flanked by the formal lounge and main suite encompassing his and hers walk-in-robes and a roomy ensuite boasting a relaxing spa bath,1200mm shower and separate WC.
Cupboards line the hallway before it opens up to the large, light-filled open-plan family, dining and kitchen areas.
The kitchen is the hub of it all with a central island, corner walk-in pantry, ample cabinetry including fabulous appliance cupboard behind bi-fold doors, gas/electric cooking appliances and a dishwasher for quick clean-ups.
But there's more - tucked away behind double doors is the ideal multi-use room - it can be a home theatre, home office, rumpus or games room you choose.
A separate wing accommodates the remaining bedrooms, bathroom, WC and storage-rich laundry while glass doors from the family room open to extensive outdoor living zones with a paved, sun-kissed alfresco area and an all-weather gazebo combined it creates an entertaining zone for all ages and stages of life.
Desirable features include ducted heating/cooling, eye-catching recycled brick hallway wall, higher ceilings and high-grade floor coverings.
The oversized lot includes a remote double garage with rear roller door beside the house and side access to a separate yard with 6m x 9m shed/workshop and double carport for boat/ trailer or a tradie's vehicles.
Easily maintained gardens enhance the property located handy to many essential amenities including Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Big Hill Primary School and public transport.
Inspect today - it's a great place to call home.

Description:
CHARM & POTENTIAL
Positioned on the Melbourne side of the city, this weatherboard cottage is walking distance to bus stop, Lansell Square, Bendigo Homemaker Centre and medical practitioners. Sitting on a wide allotment on a service road, the home enjoys many original features providing charm and character.
The front door opens into an entry hall and the mid-century detail of the property is apparent throughout including decorative cornice and picture railing. Off the hallway is the master bedroom, a spacious room with built-in robes and dressing table, ceiling fan and split system heating and cooling. Further down the hallway is a recently renovated bathroom with walk-in shower and a second bedroom with built-in robe. This room has access to a room at the rear of the home, which could serve as a third bedroom, second living space, or home office.
A lounge room off the main entry enjoys a gas heater in the original brick fireplace, and next door is a large kitchen diner. This room has recently been refurbished with new timber-look flooring and contemporary cabinetry blending perfectly with original storage. A door from the kitchen leads down to a mud room, large laundry, separate toilet and access to the versatile rear room.
The back door opens out to a porch covering steps down to the rear garden. Double gates from the carport at the front allow vehicle access in to the rear yard. A variety of outbuildings are ideal for a workshop, studio or extra storage and a lawn area, paved alfresco and fernery provide an easy-care green space. A gate opens up to an entirely separate section of the yard, and the two areas could easily be opened up to a single large garden.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling in kitchen and master bedroom
Gas heating
Stove with separate grill and four-burner gas cooktop in kitchen
Refurbished bathroom and kitchen
Good storage throughout
Vehicle access to rear yard
Single carport, single shed and outbuildings
Positioned in a practical locale with all amenities at your doorstep, this charming property has fantastic possibility. Absolutely ideal for a first home buyer or someone seeking a home they can add value to. This home is move-in ready yet offers an abundance of potential.

Description:
Investment Potential
This well designed home is set on a very quiet street & with no neighbours across the road, directly overlooks tranquil bush land. On the Melbourne side of Bendigo, the location provides easy access to the Calder Highway as well as close proximity to all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat & Lansell Square Shopping Centre, while still only 8kms to the CBD. All the bedrooms are of a good size - the main contains a walk in robe whilst the remaining two have built in robes. There's a two way bathroom which includes a bath, shower & vanity with a separate toilet adjacent. The kitchen provides good bench & cupboard space including a built in corner pantry. This opens to the light & bright dining/meals area & lounge with a glass sliding door to the outdoor pergola, perfect for entertaining. Heating & cooling is maintained throughout by a split system & gas wall furnace. The property also has a laundry with built in storage, linen cupboard, single lock up garage with remote & internal access to the house, as well as a spacious, fully enclosed yard. With a potential rent return of $335 per week, this home will make a great addition to your investment portfolio.

Description:
PLENTY OF POSITIVES - JUDGE FOR YOURSELF
Positioned in popular Hope Street is this updated 60's weatherboard home on over 973m2. It is a no-through road close to schools, shops and transport and it has been consistently updated in recent years.
Inside you have three good sized bedrooms all with built-in-robes, and updated family bathroom with separate bath, shower and vanity basin; there's a separate toilet and built-in storage in the laundry. The lounge is spacious with a large window looking to Hope Street, adjacent is a large kitchen-meals. The kitchen is five years young and boasts double sink, gas hot plates and electric oven, loads of pot-drawers and views to the rear yard.
There's a lovely and spacious front veranda as well as a large covered alfresco out back - it has a concrete floor and large planter box. There is sealed driveway access to the side of the house, there's a single carport and a powered 6m x 9m garage with concrete floor - super solid and higher than normal clearance.
The yard is so spacious you still have room for the kids to play in the grassed rear yard and there is some sundry shedding and outbuildings beyond the garage. The yard also offers scope to extend the home or sub-divide the block, or just enjoy the yard space which is a rarity so close to Kangaroo Flat main street.

Description:
1950s WEATHERBOARD WITH AMPLE SCOPE
Sitting in a wide, quiet, established street and just one block from the Kangaroo Flat Bushland Reserve, is this 1950s weatherboard cottage. Close to the Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre and all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat including schools, shops, supermarkets, bus stops and train station this property is also conveniently positioned on the Melbourne side of the city.
The easy-care, neat front yard includes a large, established tree offering privacy and shade, and the front door opens into a central hallway with two bedrooms leading off either side. Original character detail can be found throughout, including decorative cornice, picture railing and timber flooring in the bedrooms and lounge. Further down the hallway is a light and bright bathroom that has been recently refurbished. A third bedroom can be found at the rear of the home.
At the end of the hall is an open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The contemporary kitchen provides good storage and modern appliances, and a cosy, gas log fire sits under the original brick mantle in the lounge. A step down from the living space takes you to a large mud room and off this area is a sizeable laundry on one side, the third bedroom on the other, and a door to the rear yard.
Outside, a brick paved alfresco area runs the width of the home and features a built-in bar, perfect for entertaining. The remainder of the perfectly proportioned allotment is set to lawn, with a few established trees at the rear. Double gates from the driveway, provide secure vehicle access to the backyard, and there is a single gate on the other side of the house.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Gas log fire
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, five-burner gas cooktop and electric oven
Original details such as decorative cornice and picture railing
Secure vehicle access to rear yard
This sweet home is absolutely ideal for a buyer seeking a move-in ready house they can also add value to a fantastic offering to step on to the property ladder, or to secure a good investment option. With a spacious backyard and positioned in a quiet street on the Melbourne side of the city, this home provides ample scope.
Insights: 8 Gordon Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 3 Secluded Place Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Secluded Place Estate: Substantial Allotment 1462m2
For those who had given up hope of ever finding large building allotments in a suburban position, here is your opportunity to secure an impressive, boutique allotment. Titles issued and ready for settlement so you can commence building your new home.
Zoned General Residential, all services will be available to the allotment.
Seclusion and privacy within a private court, with a scenic outlook of established trees and plant life. All within a few minutes drive to shopping, schools, recreational facilities and medical care.
Exceptional frontage and generous building guidelines will ensure abundant space to build your dream residence, and still have ample room to build a shed or park a caravan, trailer, or boat.
Premium allotment, situated amongst quality homes, only a short walk from the scenic Forest Lake.
Directions: Enter Aspera Way off Queen Street. Secluded Place is accessed from Aspera Way.
Lots 1,2,4 & 7 are also currently available, prices as follow:

Description:
FEELS LIKE HOME!
Superbly located opposite natural bush land and with elevated views towards Mount Alexander this home is a rare find. Full of character and charm the home features polished timber boards, cathedral ceilings and large feature windows that allow an abundance of natural light to filter through the home. The split level design creates a cosy lounge with wood fire and sliding doors that lead to the generous rear entertainers deck. Built for those who love to entertain the rear deck overlooks the generous rear yard while offering panoramic views to the south.
The current vendors have transformed this property both inside and out to create a warm and inviting home that captures the best of its surrounds. Whether you're entertaining friends on the rear deck or enjoying a quiet night in beside the wood fire you can enjoy the picturesque outlook that's on offer.
In all the property features 3 bedrooms including spacious master with ensuire and WIR, fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, undercover parking for 3 vehicles and a 920m2 allotment.
Other features include:
- 5kw Solar System
- 2 x split system heating/cooling units
- Wood fire in lounge
